header_text: You have been asked to give a presentation about some of your latest projects at a major conference. This is a great opportunity to highlight the good work you have been doing, but you feel nervous talking in front of such a big group of your peers. As you think about how the people at the conference will react to your presentation, you believe they will think you looked nervous.
